item.description:
Come see one of the best ski/snowboard films of the year. I went to this event it it is definitely a party atmosphere. I plan to get there early, they will give away a Mt Snow ticket to first 400 in line.
It may be just as easy to meet inside anyway, I will email my cell to anyone that will make it.

I will take the T over from Somerville if anyone wants to travel together. I will proably leave from Lechmere station at 5:45pm

Teton Gravity Research - Under the Influence
Friday, November 14, 2008
BOSTON, MA

The Roxy
SHOWTIME: Doors at 7:00 PM
Showtime at 8:00 PM


Tickets: $25 - Go to http://www.wantickets...

Please buy your own ticket, I suggest buying ahead of time

The Roxy
279 Tremont St
Boston, MA 02116
(617) 338-7699
item.name: Teton Gravity Research - Under the Influence @Roxy
